The butter-infused crab legs have a rich aroma that washes over the tastes buds so seductively that before you know it, you've eaten it all, and are left sipping at the dregs of butter in the crab's shell, hoping to recapture a fragment of the dish's beauty.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 308 and healing effects by 10% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

food.name: Calla Lily Seafood Soup
food.description: A balanced combination of seafood. The delicacy of crab and mint make for a clear soup, and the calla lily brings it a refreshing taste.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Calla Lily Seafood Soup
suspicious.description: A balanced combination of seafood. The bitterness of the calla lily, the astringency of the mint, the fishiness of the crab... Getting all the negatives together like this takes skill.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 165 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Calla Lily Seafood Soup
normal.description: A balanced combination of seafood. The delicacy of crab and mint make for a clear soup, and the calla lily brings it a refreshing taste.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 200 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Calla Lily Seafood Soup
delicious.description: A balanced combination of seafood. The crab, mint, and Calla Lily come together perfectly to dance on your tongue. It reminds you of playing barefoot by the lake in summer.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 235 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

special.name: A Prize Catch
special.description: Tartaglia's specialty. It looks like a trapped beast floundering in an ocean of blood, its death throes an inaudible scream... But Tartaglia smiles and explains that this is something he fished out of the sea, with some products from his homeland on the side.
special.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 282 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

food.name: Chicken-Mushroom Skewer
food.description: A skewer of mushrooms and poultry. Fresh poultry is complimented by fragrant mushrooms. Don't be picky, chow down!

suspicious.name: Suspicious Chicken-Mushroom Skewer
suspicious.description: A skewer of mushrooms and poultry. At first glance it's hard to tell which is which.
suspicious.effect: Restores 8% of Max HP and an additional 800 HP to the selected character.

normal.name: Chicken-Mushroom Skewer
normal.description: A skewer of mushrooms and poultry. Fresh poultry is complimented by fragrant mushrooms. Don't be picky, chow down!
normal.effect: Restores 9% of Max HP and an additional 1,000 HP to the selected character.

delicious.name: Delicious Chicken-Mushroom Skewer
delicious.description: A skewer of mushrooms and poultry. All the best the wild has to offer are pierced on just one stick.
delicious.effect: Restores 10% of Max HP and an additional 1,200 HP to the selected character.

special.name: Fruity Skewers
special.description: Kaeya's specialty. A chewy skewer with a rich sweet aftertaste. Wait... Is this really the smell of fruit?
special.effect: Restores 16% of Max HP and an additional 1,350 HP to the selected character.

food.name: Chicken Tofu Pudding
food.description: A dish that requires great precision to make. The finely diced chicken breast is stirred vigorously and added into a soup with various other minced meats, before being cooked over a small flame. The result is light and elegant, and it tastes like tofu pudding. The meat is presented in such a form that the experience of consuming it is like tasting the finest chicken one has ever eaten, yet without appearing to have eaten chicken at all. This is part of Liyue's culinary fine arts.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Chicken Tofu Pudding
suspicious.description: A dish that requires great precision to make. The soup base is far too salty and the texture of the chicken tofu pudding is not delicate enough. Lack of technical proficiency has led to a dish that looks the part, but has no soul.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 224 and CRIT Rate by 6% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Chicken Tofu Pudding
normal.description: A dish that requires great precision to make. The finely diced chicken breast is stirred vigorously and added into a soup with various other minced meats, before being cooked over a small flame. The result is light and elegant, and it tastes like tofu pudding. The meat is presented in such a form that the experience of consuming it is like tasting the finest chicken one has ever eaten, yet without appearing to have eaten chicken at all. This is part of Liyue's culinary fine arts.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 272 and CRIT Rate by 8% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Chicken Tofu Pudding
delicious.description: A dish that requires great precision to make. Successfully formed into a single block with no debris, it truly looks like tofu pudding. Its exquisite tenderness unravels on the tongue the moment it is scooped up with a porcelain spoon and fed into the mouth, and the taste is so sublime that it almost feels like having an out-of-body experience. What lies before you is no mere dish, but a gentle breeze, a pure spring, a stroke of the divine.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 320 and CRIT Rate by 10% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

food.name: Chili-Mince Cornbread Buns
food.description: A traditional snack from Liyue. The fresh dough is turned out into a round, rested, and then placed inside a cage to steam. The meat and vegetables are then washed, diced, before being fried quickly in an oiled wok. When eaten, the fried condiments must be placed into the empty space in the middle of the buns before they are eaten together. Between the crisp vegetables and the flavorful meat, this is solid, great flavor.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Chili-Mince Cornbread Buns
suspicious.description: A traditional snack from Liyue. A large bundle of fried-up Jueyun Chili has been piled up in the middle, and their heat is all but unbearable. Just one small bite feels like someone's trying to burn your throat. A few more bites, and who knows, you might actually end up breathing fire like Guoba!
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 25% and DEF by 165 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Chili-Mince Cornbread Buns
normal.description: A traditional snack from Liyue. The fresh dough is turned out into a round, rested, and then placed inside a cage to steam. The meat and vegetables are then washed, diced, before being fried quickly in an oiled wok. When eaten, the fried condiments must be placed into the empty space in the middle of the buns before they are eaten together. Between the crisp vegetables and the flavorful meat, this is solid, great flavor.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 30% and DEF by 200 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Chili-Mince Cornbread Buns
delicious.description: A traditional snack from Liyue. The intense charred aroma of the wok sits on the condiments, which are shoveled into the fluffy buns, filling the air with a fragrance that itself worth rave reviews. Just as the laboring hands of Liyue's people created this famous, prosperous harbor, these ordinary ingredients can be "developed" by one's labor into something surprising in its deliciousness. No wonder such a dish could even awaken a sleeping god...
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 35% and DEF by 235 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

food.name: Cold Cut Platter
food.description: A plate of cold cut meat. An equal balance of bacon, ham and sausage keeps everyone happy.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Cold Cut Platter
suspicious.description: A plate of cold cut meat. Seems a little too cold, probably not good for those with bad teeth or sensitive stomachs.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 20% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Cold Cut Platter
normal.description: A plate of cold cut meat. An equal balance of bacon, ham and sausage keeps everyone happy.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 30% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Cold Cut Platter
delicious.description: A plate of cold cut meat. The seasoning is just delightful enough to bring out the flavors perfectly. With a mouth full of meaty ecstasy, one worries about nothing.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 40% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

special.name: Die Heilige Sinfonie
special.description: Fischl's specialty. The exquisite presentation doth seem to communicate some incomprehensible enigma. When partaking, if one were to gaze upon Fischl, one might see her expectant gaze peek through the gaps of her fingers, which she is using to cover half her face... Is this also part of the mystery?
special.effect: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 55% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

food.name: Come and Get It
food.description: A dish made out of a luxurious variety of ingredients. There is no great refinement in the making of this food, and it appears in Liyue often during festival season. Whenever this dish is served up, the person at the head of the table will invite everyone to dig in, saying "Come on, eat, eat," hence the name.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Come and Get It
suspicious.description: A dish made out of a luxurious variety of ingredients... dumped into scalding-hot water and boiled beyond recognition. As if the taste of everything and nothing at the same time isn't bad enough, you'll want to watch out for the sand, too...
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 10% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Come and Get It
normal.description: A dish made out of a luxurious variety of ingredients. There is no great refinement in the making of this food, and it appears in Liyue often during festival season. Whenever this dish is served up, the person at the head of the table will invite everyone to dig in, saying "Come on, eat, eat," hence the name.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 15% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Come and Get It
delicious.description: A dish made out of a luxurious variety of ingredients. The mixture of meat and vegetables is spot-on, the presentation is flawless, and the blend of flavors in the broth brings out the best of everything. Don't mind if I do.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 20% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

special.name: No Tomorrow
special.description: Qiqi's specialty. The neat rows of ingredients seem at once exotic and delicious, and Baizhu says that Qiqi has spent a long time creating this dish. Still, once one considers that Qiqi has no sense of taste, just putting chopsticks to the food is going to take some courage.
special.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 20% and CRIT DMG by 20% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s)

food.name: Crab, Ham & Veggie Bake
food.description: A luxurious bake. Cracks through the golden outer skin reveal a medley of rosy ham and bright vegetables. How tantalizing!

suspicious.name: Suspicious Crab, Ham & Veggie Bake
suspicious.description: A somewhat luxurious bake. By looking at it, no one can tell what it is made of... or what it lacks.
suspicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 900 HP.

normal.name: Crab, Ham & Veggie Bake
normal.description: A luxurious bake. Cracks through the golden outer skin reveal a medley of rosy ham and bright vegetables. How tantalizing!
normal.effect: Revives a character and restores 1200 HP.

delicious.name: Delicious Crab, Ham & Veggie Bake
delicious.description: A luxurious bake. The scent is so rich and heavenly. You'll only be done once you've licked the plate clean.
delicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 1500 HP.

special.name: Nutritious Meal (V.593)
special.description: Sucrose's specialty. It looks like some strange alchemical product at first, but Sucrose insists that it is a healthy and nutritious meal, the result of many experiments and painstaking improvements. Its healthy green color comes from a mix of cream and natural vegetable juices... Wait, vegetable juices?
special.effect: Revives the selected character and restores 20% of Max HP, then restores an additional 1500 HP.

food.name: Crab Roe Kourayaki
food.description: A crab meat dish that has been cooked directly over the flames. The meat and roe are mixed evenly, before being garnished with plump crab legs. The happiness that flows forth from that first bite imparts meaning upon your prior forbearance.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Crab Roe Kourayaki
suspicious.description: A crab meat dish that has been cooked directly over the flames. The crushed shell-fragments and the crab roe have been slurried together. Butting your teeth up against those hard bits is one thing, but irrecoverable is any desire you may have had to enjoy the food.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 66 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Crab Roe Kourayaki
normal.description: A crab meat dish that has been cooked directly over the flames. The meat and roe are mixed evenly, before being garnished with plump crab legs. The happiness that flows forth from that first bite imparts meaning upon your prior forbearance.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 81 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Crab Roe Kourayaki
delicious.description: A crab meat dish that has been cooked directly over the flames. The crab meat still has a lovely scarlet shade, and its meat is tender and juicy. The crab roe has a refreshing aroma, and is rich and mellow to the taste. The sheer grace of this entity upon your tongue makes you start to wonder how the crab shell might taste.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 95 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

food.name: Crab Roe Tofu
food.description: A dish with a tender mouthfeel. Crab roe is stir-fried till the oil within oozes out before being added to boiled tofu and accented with broth. Simple, yes, but gloriously fresh.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Crab Roe Tofu
suspicious.description: A dish with a tender mouthfeel. Even the freshest crab roe cannot mask the taste of over-aged tofu. Crushing it up with your chopsticks and mixing it into white rice is all you can do to force it down your gullet.
suspicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 250 HP.

normal.name: Crab Roe Tofu
normal.description: A dish with a tender mouthfeel. Crab roe is stir-fried till the oil within oozes out before being added to boiled tofu and accented with broth. Simple, yes, but gloriously fresh.
normal.effect: Revives a character and restores 400 HP.

delicious.name: Delicious Crab Roe Tofu
delicious.description: A dish with a tender mouthfeel. The tofu is so tender that it might break if you blew on a spoonful of it. Each granule of the crab roe is plump and filled with crab oil that oozes out onto your lips the moment you have a single bite. Chewing is not needed at all. The food travels down your gullet in a flash, leaving nothing but the memory of its fresh flavor.
delicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 550 HP.

special.name: "My Way"
special.description: Yanfei's specialty is Crab Roe Tofu done to an incredible degree of regularity. Its dimensions and flavor are all faithfully rendered according to the "Crab Roe Tofu Laws" in the recipe, with not a single letter omitted.
special.effect: Revives a character and restores 15% of Max HP, then restores an additional 550 HP.

food.name: Cream Stew
food.description: A meat and vegetable stew. The thick juices taste great with the tender meat and vegetables.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Cream Stew
suspicious.description: A meat and vegetable stew. Surprisingly dry for something that's meant to have liquid.
suspicious.effect: Decreases all party members' sprinting Stamina consumption by 15% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Cream Stew
normal.description: A meat and vegetable stew. The thick juices taste great with the tender meat and vegetables.
normal.effect: Decreases all party members' sprinting Stamina consumption by 20% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Cream Stew
delicious.description: A meat and vegetable stew. These warm, buttery ingredients are so good that you almost want to dive into the cream stew and cuddle up with them.
delicious.effect: Decreases all party members' sprinting Stamina consumption by 25% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

special.name: Spicy Stew
special.description: Barbara's specialty. Carrots cut into cute little stars make this dish... Wait, AHH, where did this spiciness come from!?
special.effect: Decreases all party members' sprinting Stamina consumption by 25% for 1500s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

food.name: Crispy Potato Shrimp Platter
food.description: An attractive-looking pre-meal snack. A spread made from potatoes and berries is placed onto crispy potato slices, and a whole shrimp is then added on top. The fragrant and full-bodied flavors serve to whet the appetite, while the addition of Mint adds a whole other dimension to the mix.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Crispy Potato Shrimp Platter
suspicious.description: An attractive-looking pre-meal snack. Too much time was unknowingly spent being preoccupied with the details of this dish's form. The potato slices that were meant to form the base have already turned soft, detracting greatly from the mouthfeel.
suspicious.effect: Restores 26% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 450 HP every 5s for 30s.

normal.name: Crispy Potato Shrimp Platter
normal.description: An attractive-looking pre-meal snack. A spread made from potatoes and berries is placed onto crispy potato slices, and a whole shrimp is then added on top. The fragrant and full-bodied flavors serve to whet the appetite, while the addition of Mint adds a whole other dimension to the mix.
normal.effect: Restores 28% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 620 HP every 5s for 30s.

delicious.name: Delicious Crispy Potato Shrimp Platter
delicious.description: An attractive-looking pre-meal snack. The moment this enters your mouth, the springiness of the shrimp and the crispiness of the potato slices form a profound contrast. The fluffy potatoes immediately follow up by melding these flavors together, creating a sweet experience that makes you relax, body and soul.
delicious.effect: Restores 30% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 790 HP every 5s for 30s.

food.name: Crystal Shrimp
food.description: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. The stuffing is taken from whole fresh shrimp, and the glistening quality of the flour can be guessed at from the translucence of the outer skin. Has a springy, tasty chew.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Crystal Shrimp
suspicious.description: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. The dull outer skin has a rather sticky mouthfeel which, when combined with the dry stuffing within, makes this dish a torment best ended sooner.
suspicious.effect: Restores 18% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 300 HP every 5s for 30s.

normal.name: Crystal Shrimp
normal.description: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. The stuffing is taken from whole fresh shrimp, and the glistening quality of the flour can be guessed at from the translucence of the outer skin. Has a springy, tasty chew.
normal.effect: Restores 20% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 390 HP every 5s for 30s.

delicious.name: Delicious Crystal Shrimp
delicious.description: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. The outer skin is as clear its crystal namesake, and when it enters the mouth, one's tongue could be forgiven for thinking that the fresh shrimp within is still alive. Those who eat it can only lament that four pieces per serving is far, far too few.
delicious.effect: Restores 22% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 470 HP every 5s for 30s.

special.name: All-Delicacy Parcels
special.description: Xingqiu's specialty. This dish's almost artisan appearance makes one almost reluctant to tuck in. But once you get a taste, its fresh, light and lovely sweetness will make the dish hard to put down.... Hang on a moment. Did he throw the carrots out, by any chance?
special.effect: Restores 26% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 570 HP every 5s for 30s.

food.name: Cured Pork Dry Hotpot
food.description: A dish fried over a great flame. Matsutake and Ham have been sliced up, stir-fried, and garnished with some spicy condiments. The flavor of the Ham is a match for the Matsutake's crispness, and the combination grows ever lovelier and more addictive as you chew. The heat-conducting wok also serves to keep it piping hot for long periods.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Cured Pork Dry Hotpot
suspicious.description: A dish fried over a great flame. The quality of the pork is fair enough, but it is far too salty. Have a piece of this, and you will taste nothing but brine in your mouth no matter how many Snapdragons or Matsutake mushrooms you consume.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 10% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Cured Pork Dry Hotpot
normal.description: A dish fried over a great flame. Matsutake and Ham have been sliced up, stir-fried, and garnished with some spicy condiments. The flavor of the Ham is a match for the Matsutake's crispness, and the combination grows ever lovelier and more addictive as you chew. The heat-conducting wok also serves to keep it piping hot for long periods.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 15% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Cured Pork Dry Hotpot
delicious.description: A dish fried over a great flame. The rendered fat from the fried ham layers the side dishes perfectly, and the flavors have long permeated the whole dish. Its shine alone is enough to whet one's appetite, and every bite is sure to evoke memories of house, home, and celebration in anyone from Liyue.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 20% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

food.name: Dry-Braised Salted Fish
food.description: Dried fish that has been grilled slowly over a charcoal flame. Fish air-dried overnight have a tinge of the salty sea wind and give off a tantalizing flavor when grilled. Many Inazumans who dwell near the sea know this taste well indeed.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Dry-Braised Salted Fish
suspicious.description: Dried fish that has been grilled slowly over a charcoal flame. Every last droplet of moisture within the fish has been drained away, leaving behind naught but a texture that can only be compared to chewing on timber. One can barely tell the difference between fish and bones in here.
suspicious.effect: Restores 8% of Max HP and an additional 800 HP to the selected character.

normal.name: Dry-Braised Salted Fish
normal.description: Dried fish that has been grilled slowly over a charcoal flame. Fish air-dried overnight have a tinge of the salty sea wind and give off a tantalizing flavor when grilled. Many Inazumans who dwell near the sea know this taste well indeed.
normal.effect: Restores 9% of Max HP and an additional 1,000 HP to the selected character.

delicious.name: Delicious Dry-Braised Salted Fish
delicious.description: Dried fish that has been grilled slowly over a charcoal flame. The rich fats ooze out as the fish meets the grill, and with those sizzling sounds, the fish is clothed in a burnished golden coat. The meat is firm but delicious, and the mouthfeel is quite delicate. Such is the unsurpassed gift of the seas.
delicious.effect: Restores 10% of Max HP and an additional 1,200 HP to the selected character.

special.name: All-Weather Beauty
special.description: Kaedehara Kazuha's specialty. Made from fish that have been dried on the ship. Kazuha claims that they were completely ordinary fish. But this flavor... this must surely be the definition of free, all-embracing nature, no?
special.effect: Restores 16% of Max HP and an additional 1,350 HP to the selected character.

food.name: Egg Roll
food.description: A fried egg dish. Beat eggs well, season and fry them slowly in a wok, roll up into a fixed shape. Pour in egg liquid again and continue until it has all reached a certain thickness, then get ready to plate up. This is a ordinary yet welcoming Inazuman delicacy.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Egg Roll
suspicious.description: A fried egg dish. It looks way too soft... and what do you know, it comes apart the instant it so much as touches chopsticks. Might as well use a spoon at this point.
suspicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 50 HP.

normal.name: Egg Roll
normal.description: A fried egg dish. Beat eggs well, season and fry them slowly in a wok, roll up into a fixed shape. Pour in egg liquid again and continue until it has all reached a certain thickness, then get ready to plate up. This is a ordinary yet welcoming Inazuman delicacy.
normal.effect: Revives a character and restores 100 HP.

delicious.name: Delicious Egg Roll
delicious.description: A fried egg dish. The shape of the dish as a whole, the golden color, the fluffy mouthfeel... a small piece of this may not fill your stomach, but it will fill you with warmth. Not to mention that sweetness that you can almost reach out and touch — simply irresistible.
delicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 150 HP.

special.name: Faith Eternal
special.description: Kujou Sara's specialty. Forget calling it a dish, this is really more like a snack. The sweet, fluffy flavor really doesn't seem to suit Sara's own preferences. Wait a moment. That symbol on the snack — does this have to do with a certain other person's tastes instead?
special.effect: Revives a character and restores 10% of Max HP, then restores an additional 150 HP.

food.name: Fisherman's Toast
food.description: Onion-covered toast. A favorite amongst fishermen, they will stuff a bag with it and sit by the river all day.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Fisherman's Toast
suspicious.description: Onion-covered toast. Not quite cooked right. You'll notice its imperfection, even if you eat it while fishing.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 88 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Fisherman's Toast
normal.description: Onion-covered toast. A favorite amongst fishermen, they will stuff a bag with it and sit by the river all day.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 107 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Fisherman's Toast
delicious.description: Onion-covered toast. Exudes a wonderful aroma. Are the fish biting for the bait, or is it the toast they're after?
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 126 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

special.name: Fish-Flavored Toast
special.description: Klee's specialty. By way of apology for wantonly using her bombs to scare away the fish, Jean instructed Klee to make this toast for the fishermen. It's filling and tasty. Klee will never starve again, even after a whole day of blast fishing.
special.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 151 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

food.name: Flaming Red Bolognese
food.description: Bolognese covered with a meat sauce. The meaty, herby aroma really gets your appetite going.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Flaming Red Bolognese
suspicious.description: Bolognese covered with a meat sauce. A bit chewy and annoyingly sticks to your teeth.
suspicious.effect: Restores 18% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 300 HP every 5s for 30s.

normal.name: Flaming Red Bolognese
normal.description: Bolognese covered with a meat sauce. The meaty, herby aroma really gets your appetite going.
normal.effect: Restores 20% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 390 HP every 5s for 30s.

delicious.name: Delicious Flaming Red Bolognese
delicious.description: Bolognese covered with a meat sauce. The beautiful, authentic flavors take you on a culinary adventure from the first bite to the last.
delicious.effect: Restores 22% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 470 HP every 5s for 30s.

special.name: Mysterious Bolognese
special.description: Lisa's specialty. With an inexplicable aura, this bolognese is so exotic that you can never have enough. Did she actually enchant it with some kind of magic?
special.effect: Restores 26% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 570 HP every 5s for 30s.

food.name: Fragrant Mashed Potatoes
food.description: Seasoned mashed potatoes. The potatoes were thoroughly mashed before a sauce was drizzled over them. The mouthfeel is soft and smooth and it has a rich, multi-layered flavor profile. A satisfying choice for a hungry stomach, whether as a side or as a main dish.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Fragrant Mashed Potatoes
suspicious.description: Seasoned mashed potatoes. Some unmashed chunks have been mixed into the lot, adding a measure of unwanted randomness to the dish.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 160 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Fragrant Mashed Potatoes
normal.description: Seasoned mashed potatoes. The potatoes were thoroughly mashed before a sauce was drizzled over them. The mouthfeel is soft and smooth and it has a rich, multi-layered flavor profile. A satisfying choice for a hungry stomach, whether as a side or as a main dish.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 194 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Fragrant Mashed Potatoes
delicious.description: Seasoned mashed potatoes. As you take a bite of this fine potato mash, an intense flavor develops on your tongue that is mixed with its natural freshness and the taste of dairy. Such a graceful flavor can hardly be thought to have emerged from an ingredient as plebeian as potatoes.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 228 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

food.name: Fried Radish Balls
food.description: Fried Radish Balls. Fragrant and crispy. Make sure to eat them while they're hot! Said to be a recipe from Liyue.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Fried Radish Balls
suspicious.description: Fried Radish Balls. Way too oily, and leaves you looking for something to drink to cut through the grease.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 66 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Fried Radish Balls
normal.description: Fried Radish Balls. Fragrant and crispy. Make sure to eat them while they're hot! Said to be a recipe from Liyue.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 81 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Fried Radish Balls
delicious.description: Fried Radish Balls. It's insane that something so delicious comes from plain old radishes! All who eat them will truly understand Liyue's culinary reputation.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 95 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

food.name: Fullmoon Egg
food.description: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. The egg has been beaten into the flour to form a dough and the shrimp and fish have been diced, minced, and packaged into the shape of a teacup, before being garnished with whole shrimp and steamed in a pot. The resulting design is like that of clouds embracing the moon, hence the name Fullmoon Egg.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Fullmoon Egg
suspicious.description: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. The warped dough wraps the meat stiffly, and the dry mouthfeel leads to the illusion that one is chewing on a giant chunk of gnocchi.
suspicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 900 HP.

normal.name: Fullmoon Egg
normal.description: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. The egg has been beaten into the flour to form a dough and the shrimp and fish have been diced, minced, and packaged into the shape of a teacup, before being garnished with whole shrimp and steamed in a pot. The resulting design is like that of clouds embracing the moon, hence the name Fullmoon Egg.
normal.effect: Revives a character and restores 1,200 HP.

delicious.name: Delicious Fullmoon Egg
delicious.description: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. Take a bite while it's hot, and have your tastebuds savor the tender minced meat and delicious juice, an experience which is then topped off with a finishing touch of sweet prawn. Before your eyes, you can almost see a full moon over rippling waters, a fishing boat by the shore, and the fishermen's songs echoing down the years.
delicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 1500 HP.

food.name: Golden Chicken Burger
food.description: A hamburger in which the fowl meat is the main star. The fluffy bread sandwiches slices of fresh vegetables and a flavorful, crispy fowl fillet. No utensils required here: Just grab it in your hands and bite down on that bundle of rich, satisfying succulence with a hearty "ker-runch!"

suspicious.name: Suspicious Golden Chicken Burger
suspicious.description: A burger in which the fowl meat is the main star. The patty has been cut too thin and smeared with too much flour, causing it to taste like bread sandwiching more fried bread.
suspicious.effect: Restores 30% of Max HP and an additional 600 HP to the selected character.

normal.name: Golden Chicken Burger
normal.description: A hamburger in which the fowl meat is the main star. The fluffy bread sandwiches slices of fresh vegetables and a flavorful, crispy fowl fillet. No utensils required here: Just grab it in your hands and bite down on that bundle of rich, satisfying succulence with a hearty "ker-runch!"
normal.effect: Restores 32% of Max HP and an additional 1,250 HP to the selected character.

delicious.name: Delicious Golden Chicken Burger
delicious.description: A burger in which the fowl meat is the main star. The fowl fillet has been wrapped in gold and is so tender that you could almost squeeze the meat juices out. The dense flavor of the sauce and refreshing mouthfeel of the vegetables makes you feel like you're walking on clouds as you lose yourself in this feast lying in your palm.
delicious.effect: Restores 34% of Max HP and an additional 1,900 HP to the selected character.

food.name: Golden Crab
food.description: A crab dish cooked in the ancient ways. The crab has been chopped into pieces and battered with flour, before being stir-fried till golden and rich with flavor. It is worthy of the word "gold," whether in terms of appearance or quality.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Golden Crab
suspicious.description: A crab dish cooked in the ancient ways. The flour granules within have congealed like gravel, and have some crab shell mixed in. But compared to the blandness of the crab meat, the taste of crab shell is at least worth having a go at.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 215 and healing effects by 6% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Golden Crab
normal.description: A crab dish cooked in the ancient ways. The crab has been chopped into pieces and battered with flour, before being stir-fried till golden and rich with flavor. It is worthy of the word "gold," whether in terms of appearance or quality.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 261 and healing effects by 8% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Golden Crab
delicious.description: A crab dish cooked in the ancient ways. The aroma of the crab meat inundates the room the instant it leaves the frying pan, and a single bite fills one's palate with the countless rustic flavors of a fishing village hometown. It seems that such simple yet timeless village customs held the secret to this lavish, golden sumptuousness all along.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 308 and healing effects by 10% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

food.name: Golden Fried Chicken
food.description: Fowl that has been seasoned and then fried. The seasonings were made into a paste and smeared onto the chicken before it was fried at high temperature. The fragrance alone brings the vivid image of crispy skin and tender meat to mind. One bite and the luscious juices begin to flow. Truly irresistible.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Golden Fried Chicken
suspicious.description: Fowl that has been seasoned and then fried. Perhaps the oil temperature was not sufficiently well-controlled, but what should have been a crispy outer skin seems to have gone all soggy, adding to the overall greasiness by at least a few degrees.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 224 and CRIT Rate by 6% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Golden Fried Chicken
normal.description: Fowl that has been seasoned and then fried. The seasonings were made into a paste and smeared onto the chicken before it was fried at high temperature. The fragrance alone brings the vivid image of crispy skin and tender meat to mind. One bite and the luscious juices begin to flow. Truly irresistible.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 272 and CRIT Rate by 8% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Golden Fried Chicken
delicious.description: Fowl that has been seasoned and then fried. The golden outer skin has all but sealed the abundant juices into the meat, leading to absolute enjoyment with each bite. The taste at your fingertips will linger in memory far longer than the instant it takes to reduce the meal to nothing but slim bones.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 320 and CRIT Rate by 10% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

food.name: Golden Shrimp Balls
food.description: A deep-fried shrimp dish. The aroma assaults your senses, while the crispy potatoes bring out the light sweetness of the shrimp meat. This, in tandem with its cute, small shape, makes it very enticing indeed.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Golden Shrimp Balls
suspicious.description: A deep-fried shrimp dish. Hastily cast into hot oil and promptly forgotten about, the result is a disastrous combination of raw shrimp and burnt potato strips.
suspicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 900 HP.

normal.name: Golden Shrimp Balls
normal.description: A deep-fried shrimp dish. The aroma assaults your senses, while the crispy potatoes bring out the light sweetness of the shrimp meat. This, in tandem with its cute, small shape, makes it very enticing indeed.
normal.effect: Revives a character and restores 1200 HP.

delicious.name: Delicious Golden Shrimp Balls
delicious.description: A deep-fried shrimp dish. From the rich, indulgent scent of crispy golden potato strips, to the satisfying crunch as you take your first bite, to the grand finale of delicious sweet shrimp, this dish is pure pleasure.
delicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 1500 HP.

food.name: Goulash
food.description: Hot stew made from Chilled Meat and vegetables chopped into small pieces. Slow-boiled tomatoes give this dish a rich and thick texture. Filling one's stomach with this comforting mixture has a warming effect.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Goulash
suspicious.description: A steaming-hot stew. There was some flaw in the flame control during the stewing process, leading to a product with a very stiff mouthfeel. You can ignore those flaws if you scarf it all down — it'll keep the cold away regardless.
suspicious.effect: Slightly decreases the rate of Sheer Cold accumulation for all party members for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Goulash
normal.description: Hot stew made from Chilled Meat and vegetables chopped into small pieces. Slow-boiled tomatoes give this dish a rich and thick texture. Filling one's stomach with this comforting mixture has a warming effect.
normal.effect: Somewhat decreases the rate of Sheer Cold accumulation for all party members for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Goulash
delicious.description: A steaming-hot stew. Just one spoonful sends a down-to-earth sense of satisfaction welling up from the depths of your heart. The meat's flavor grows with every chew, bringing limitless strength to the eater even in the coldest wintry wastes.
delicious.effect: Decreases the rate of Sheer Cold accumulation for all party members for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

food.name: Grilled Tiger Fish
food.description: A fish kebab grilled over an open flame. The fish is a fresh catch straight from the harbor, lightly seasoned and swiftly grilled. Its aroma attracts the street cats. Indeed, freshness is the secret of flavor.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Grilled Tiger Fish
suspicious.description: A fish kebab grilled over an open flame. You can barely see that this charred lump is indeed grilled fish, and upon further investigation, the fish scales mixed in confirm that this is indeed the case.
suspicious.effect: Restores 8% of Max HP and an additional 800 HP to the selected character.

normal.name: Grilled Tiger Fish
normal.description: A fish kebab grilled over an open flame. The fish is a fresh catch straight from the harbor, lightly seasoned and swiftly grilled. Its aroma attracts the street cats. Indeed, freshness is the secret of flavor.
normal.effect: Restores 9% of Max HP and an additional 1,000 HP to the selected character.

delicious.name: Delicious Grilled Tiger Fish
delicious.description: A fish kebab grilled over an open flame. The shimmering golden skin has locked the fresh and tender meat in. You cannot help but sigh in satisfaction as you chew on it. Not a scrap of meat here will go uneaten, not even those stuck firmly to the bamboo stick.
delicious.effect: Restores 10% of Max HP and an additional 1,200 HP to the selected character.

special.name: Survival Grilled Fish
special.description: Keqing's specialty. This dish was not grilled. Instead, it was fried from within through the delicate application of Electro. A gentle bite reveals fragrant fish under the lightly charred skin, its taste perfectly balanced. So, is this how she survives in the wild? You really can't judge a book by its cover.
special.effect: Restores 16% of Max HP and an additional 1,350 HP to the selected character.

food.name: Grilled Unagi Fillet
food.description: A grilled dish. The sliced unagi has been steamed first to remove the excess fat before being grilled and sauced. There is no consensus in Inazuma as to where the name "unagi" came from, but everyone at least agrees that it will take a whole lifetime to master its making.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Grilled Unagi Fillet
suspicious.description: A grilled dish. Even at first glance, this is a complete failure — the color of the eel meat looks exactly the same as the charcoal used to make it. Even when flipped over to eat, the intense stench of charred meat would make one hesitate.
suspicious.effect: Restores 20% of Max HP and an additional 900 HP to the selected character.

normal.name: Grilled Unagi Fillet
normal.description: A grilled dish. The sliced unagi has been steamed first to remove the excess fat before being grilled and sauced. There is no consensus in Inazuma as to where the name "unagi" came from, but everyone at least agrees that it will take a whole lifetime to master its making.
normal.effect: Restores 22% of Max HP and an additional 1,200 HP to the selected character.

delicious.name: Delicious Grilled Unagi Fillet
delicious.description: A grilled dish. The fat oils sizzle all across the meat's surface like a flowery prelude. The baptism of charcoal fire and moistening sauce has imparted a delicate softness to the unagi's mouthfeel. If you paired this was rice, you'd be liable to leave not even a single drop of sauce behind.
delicious.effect: Restores 24% of Max HP and an additional 1,500 HP to the selected character.

food.name: Imported Poultry
food.description: A meat dish drizzled with sauce. The fowl is marinated before being covered in batter and fried, and a thick sauce is drizzled over it as a finishing touch. The accompanying vegetables are local produce, but the marinating methods and sauce are all imported, hence the name "imported poultry."

suspicious.name: Suspicious Imported Poultry
suspicious.description: A meat dish drizzled with sauce. Nothing seems wrong here at first, but in time, you will know the tragic extent of your failings. Poultry made without trimming off some fat and oil is far too greasy to swallow, and even its combination with vegetables cannot save this dish.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 10% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Imported Poultry
normal.description: A meat dish drizzled with sauce. The fowl is marinated before being covered in batter and fried, and a thick sauce is drizzled over it as a finishing touch. The accompanying vegetables are local produce, but the marinating methods and sauce are all imported, hence the name "imported poultry."
normal.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 15% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Imported Poultry
delicious.description: A meat dish drizzled with sauce. Having been marinated beforehand, the fowl has had several layers of flavor added to it, keeping its oiliness in perfect moderation. Bite down on that crispy, crackling flour-skin, and feel the rich juices of the fowl rush into your mouth and whet your appetite.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 20% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

food.name: Invigorating Kitty Meal
food.description: This main dish looks rather cute. With Kiminami Anna's help, this dish was made with the tastes of provisional head priestess Neko in mind. Although it does not quite match the flavor that Hibiki used to produce, Lady Neko seems rather pleased with your work nonetheless. Due to the lack of spices, humans might find this dish a tad on the plain side.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Invigorating Kitty Meal
suspicious.description: This main dish looks rather cute. However, its appearance betrays a lack of experience in the making, with the final product being every bit the hastily thrown together slapdash job. Who knows if the provisional head priestess Neko will accept this...
suspicious.effect: Restores 26% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 450 HP every 5s for 30s.

normal.name: Invigorating Kitty Meal
normal.description: This main dish looks rather cute. With Kiminami Anna's help, this dish was made with the tastes of provisional head priestess Neko in mind. Although it does not quite match the flavor that Hibiki used to produce, Lady Neko seems rather pleased with your work nonetheless. Due to the lack of spices, humans might find this dish a tad on the plain side.
normal.effect: Restores 28% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 620 HP every 5s for 30s.

delicious.name: Delicious Invigorating Kitty Meal
delicious.description: This main dish looks rather cute. The simple methodology used to make it has maximized flavor retention in its ingredients. Even cats who usually pay humdrum humanity little mind will surely come running over when they catch a whiff of this. Uh, wait a moment. Was this supposed to attract dogs, too?
delicious.effect: Restores 30% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 790 HP every 5s for 30s.

food.name: Jade Parcels
food.description: An exquisite-looking dish. The ham's sweetness is locked inside the fresh vegetables, drizzled with a spicy broth. Delicious is an understatement.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Jade Parcels
suspicious.description: An exquisite-looking dish. Food ingredients of different degrees of doneness are wrapped in shriveled vegetables. It looks depressing to say the least.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 224 and CRIT Rate by 6% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Jade Parcels
normal.description: An exquisite-looking dish. The ham's sweetness is locked inside the fresh vegetables, drizzled with a spicy broth. Delicious is an understatement.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 272 and CRIT Rate by 8% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Jade Parcels
delicious.description: An exquisite-looking dish. The sweetness of the ham and the crisp lotus seeds are a match made in heaven. The aromatic broth pours down like the dawning light, caressing your tongue with an unworldly delicious taste.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 320 and CRIT Rate by 10% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

food.name: Jewelry Soup
food.description: A simple vegetable soup. Snapdragon, tofu, and lotus seeds are put into boiling water and simmered. Jewelry Soup earned its luxurious name from the look of the ingredients used, but contrary to its name, the soup is commonly prepared and served in ordinary households.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Jewelry Soup
suspicious.description: A simple vegetable soup. The bland soup and dull vegetables remind you of the dying vegetables on abandoned and barren farmlands.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 88 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Jewelry Soup
normal.description: A simple vegetable soup. Snapdragon, tofu, and lotus seeds are put into boiling water and simmered. Jewelry Soup earned its luxurious name from the look of the ingredients used, but contrary to its name, the soup is commonly prepared and served in ordinary households.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 107 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Jewelry Soup
delicious.description: A simple vegetable soup. The mild-tasting soup is filled with the fragrance of fresh vegetables. This down-to-earth and heart-warming soup can rival any luxurious dish.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 126 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

food.name: Jueyun Chili Chicken
food.description: Chicken in a dressing, served cold. The way the dish has been prepared captures the succulence of the chicken perfectly. Beneath the glowing gold skin, the meat has a mildly hot flavor.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Jueyun Chili Chicken
suspicious.description: Chicken in a dressing, served cold. The chicken probably isn't properly marinated, so it's only salty on the outside but bland on the inside. The taste reminds you of water-poached chicken breasts.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 6% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Jueyun Chili Chicken
normal.description: Chicken in a dressing, served cold. The way the dish has been prepared captures the succulence of the chicken perfectly. Beneath the glowing gold skin, the meat has a mildly hot flavor.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 9% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Jueyun Chili Chicken
delicious.description: Chicken in a dressing, served cold. The chicken is extremely tender, juicy, and sweet. The delicious taste transports you to the realm of dreams.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 12% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

special.name: Rockin' Riffin' Chicken!
special.description: Xinyan's specialty. Its demonic appearance hides an absolutely demonic spiciness. Eat it, tear up, eat some more, and don't stop till you drop! Surely only a demon could have invented such a dish!
special.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 16% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

food.name: Jueyun Guoba
food.description: One of Liyue's specialty snacks. Stir-fried ham and Jueyun Chili sprinkled on a crispy crust made from Rice and Horsetail create a refined, meaty snack that transforms humble Rice into a hot delicacy.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Jueyun Guoba
suspicious.description: One of Liyue's specialty snacks. The browned Jueyun Chilis and ham stick together on top of a crust that has barely retained its flavor, and you can only tell them apart by the mouthfeel.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 20% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Jueyun Guoba
normal.description: One of Liyue's specialty snacks. Stir-fried ham and Jueyun Chili sprinkled on a crispy crust made from Rice and Horsetail create a refined, meaty snack that transforms humble Rice into a hot delicacy.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 30% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Jueyun Guoba
delicious.description: One of Liyue's specialty snacks. Chow down on that lovely, fragrant crust and the steaming ham sitting atop it. The spices and spiciness race neck and neck into your nostrils, creating an addictive flavor that has you licking that last finger rather than let a single scrap go to waste.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 40% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

food.name: Konda Cuisine
food.description: Slowly stewed local cuisine. Everyone in Konda Village knows how to make this dish. It originally had no name but would spread throughout Inazuma on account of its nutritious deliciousness. This eventually caused those from outside the village to give it its name — "Konda Cuisine."

suspicious.name: Suspicious Konda Cuisine
suspicious.description: Slowly stewed local cuisine. If the fowl that had not been fried beforehand could still barely be tolerated, the un-boiled lavender melon truly makes this a culinary disaster. Not only is the taste astringent, but the mix even stains your tongue to the point where someone else might think that you were being poisoned.
suspicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 900 HP.

normal.name: Konda Cuisine
normal.description: Slowly stewed local cuisine. Everyone in Konda Village knows how to make this dish. It originally had no name but would spread throughout Inazuma on account of its nutritious deliciousness. This eventually caused those from outside the village to give it its name — "Konda Cuisine."
normal.effect: Revives a character and restores 1,200 HP.

delicious.name: Delicious Konda Cuisine
delicious.description: Slowly stewed local cuisine. Well-honed temperature control has allowed every ingredient to be cooked just right. This is it — the exact same aroma that you smell, simple yet surpassing many delicacies, when you take a stroll through Konda Village at night. Surely a village local roaming abroad would begin to miss home if they were to eat this dish so made by you.
delicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 1,500 HP.

food.name: Lotus Flower Crisp
food.description: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. Sweet stuffed lotus wrapped in a crispy, deep-fried crust. Its layers of flower petals unravel perfectly in the palm of your hand.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Lotus Flower Crisp
suspicious.description: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. The lotus petals have lost their original color, turning brown and wilted under the merciless heat of hot oil.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 165 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Lotus Flower Crisp
normal.description: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. Sweet stuffed lotus wrapped in a crispy, deep-fried crust. Its layers of flower petals unravel perfectly in the palm of your hand.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 200 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Lotus Flower Crisp
delicious.description: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. The flower petals waver to life if you gently blow on them. As you close your eyes and take a bite, a luscious flavor covers your tastebuds like a sweet harmony of blooming flowers and fluttering birds in the breeze.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 235 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

food.name: Lotus Seed and Bird Egg Soup
food.description: A steamed egg dish. The clear, gold colors of the egg custard have been embellished with several lotus roots. Regardless of whether it is breakfast or a post-meal snack, its superior nutritional value can greatly nourish the body.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Lotus Seed and Bird Egg Soup
suspicious.description: A steamed egg dish. The lengthy steaming process has caused unusual honeycomb figure to appear on the surface of the egg custard. It goes without saying that there isn't hardly a hint of bitterness left in the lotus.
suspicious.effect: Decreases all party members' sprinting Stamina consumption by 15% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Lotus Seed and Bird Egg Soup
normal.description: A steamed egg dish. The clear, gold colors of the egg custard have been embellished with several lotus roots. Regardless of whether it is breakfast or a post-meal snack, its superior nutritional value can greatly nourish the body.
normal.effect: Decreases all party members' sprinting Stamina consumption by 20% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Lotus Seed and Bird Egg Soup
delicious.description: A steamed egg dish. The succulent eggs melt right in your mouth, and before you know it, a smooth and subtle sweetness of newly sprung lotus flowers covers your tastebuds.
delicious.effect: Decreases all party members' sprinting Stamina consumption by 25% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

food.name: Matsutake Meat Rolls
food.description: A pan-fried meat dish. Ground meat is put on the Matsutake and gently pan-fried on low heat so the Matsutake can fully take in the aromatic juice of the meat. It's a mouthwatering delicacy in all of its glory.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Matsutake Meat Rolls
suspicious.description: A pan-fried meat dish. Though the dry and tough texture is miles away from what it could be, the Matsutake is too nutritious to let it go to waste.
suspicious.effect: Restores 20% of Max HP and an additional 900 HP to the selected character.

normal.name: Matsutake Meat Rolls
normal.description: A pan-fried meat dish. Ground meat is put on the Matsutake and gently pan-fried on low heat so the Matsutake can fully take in the aromatic juice of the meat. It's a mouthwatering delicacy in all of its glory.
normal.effect: Restores 22% of Max HP and an additional 1,200 HP to the selected character.

delicious.name: Delicious Matsutake Meat Rolls
delicious.description: A pan-fried meat dish. It combines the essences of the mountains and the nourishments of the celestial bodies. It is a very nutritious dish that will surely bring a smile to your face.
delicious.effect: Restores 24% of Max HP and an additional 1,500 HP to the selected character.

food.name: Minty Meat Rolls
food.description: A sour-and-spicy dish. The marinated meat has been thinly sliced and rolled into the mint leaves, before being brushed with a sauce blend containing Jueyun Chilis. The unique mint flavor adds the finishing touch to this dish, turning it into an excellent addition to any cold platter.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Minty Meat Rolls
suspicious.description: A sour-and-spicy dish. The saltiness of the dipping sauce has completely covered the fresh flavor of the dish. If you don't wish to dilute it with water, then you'll just have to scarf it down with a big mouthful of rice.
suspicious.effect: Decreases all party members' gliding and sprinting Stamina consumption by 15% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Minty Meat Rolls
normal.description: A sour-and-spicy dish. The marinated meat has been thinly sliced and rolled into the mint leaves, before being brushed with a sauce blend containing Jueyun Chilis. The unique mint flavor adds the finishing touch to this dish, turning it into an excellent addition to any cold platter.
normal.effect: Decreases all party members' gliding and sprinting Stamina consumption by 20% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Minty Meat Rolls
delicious.description: A sour-and-spicy dish. The meat and mint are in exquisite equilibrium, tender and not greasy, delicate and not bitter. The spiciness awakens the twain's poetic balance with startling clarity as it leaps in your mouth, only to close with a sigh of perfection.
delicious.effect: Decreases all party members' gliding and sprinting Stamina consumption by 25% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

food.name: Mint Jelly
food.description: A refreshing dessert. The steps to making this are quite simple indeed, and when it slides down your throat, the faint, fresh flavor of mint will leave you feeling reinvigorated for the rest of the day.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Mint Jelly
suspicious.description: A refreshing dessert. Some little accidents occurred during the making of this dish, causing the jelly to emerge unevenly frozen. Well, it could still serve should you want to drink some mint cordial...
suspicious.effect: Restores 8% of Max HP and an additional 800 HP to the selected character.

normal.name: Mint Jelly
normal.description: A refreshing dessert. The steps to making this are quite simple indeed, and when it slides down your throat, the faint, fresh flavor of mint will leave you feeling reinvigorated for the rest of the day.
normal.effect: Restores 9% of Max HP and an additional 1,000 HP to the selected character.

delicious.name: Delicious Mint Jelly
delicious.description: A refreshing dessert. The perfect springiness makes for a lovely sight indeed when you strike it with the back of a small spoon. Taste that spoonful and that cool and refreshing feel will spread through your mouth instantly, dispelling any negative emotions you may harbor to the point where you feel like you've become a new person.
delicious.effect: Restores 10% of Max HP and an additional 1,200 HP to the selected character.

special.name: Satiety Gel
special.description: Aloy's specialty. The cross-section looks perfect, its shape is regular, and it gives off a cool air. At first, Aloy seemed a bit apprehensive as to whether you'd enjoy this rather unique dessert, but she was relieved when you wolfed it all down in one go...
special.effect: Restores 16% of Max HP and an additional 1,350 HP to the selected character.

food.name: Mint Salad
food.description: A fragrant salad dish. Finely chopped Jueyun Chilis blended with a sauce and mixed with Mint leaves. It looks like nothing special, but it has surprisingly potent powers of refreshment and reinvigoration. It is also the perfect palate-cleanser after a greasy, indulgent meal.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Mint Salad
suspicious.description: A fragrant salad dish. The Mint and Jueyun Chili have neither been matched nor incorporated well, which makes for a dish so spicy that any who eat it will be at a loss for words for a time.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 66 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Mint Salad
normal.description: A fragrant salad dish. Finely chopped Jueyun Chilis blended with a sauce and mixed with Mint leaves. It looks like nothing special, but it has surprisingly potent powers of refreshment and reinvigoration. It is also the perfect palate-cleanser after a greasy, indulgent meal.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 81 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Mint Salad
delicious.description: A fragrant salad dish. The slightly bitter minty-fresh flavors do not cover the blazing mouthfeel of the Jueyun Chili but instead cause the spiciness to reach new heights. The two whirl and pirouette on your tongue like a pair of contending dancers to the hearty and vigorous applause of all.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 95 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

food.name: Miso Soup
food.description: A simple and unadorned soup dish. The ingredients used here are very common and it is made simply, but this small bowl of soup has the power to ensure that you shall not grow weary on your journey, even if you travel on foot.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Miso Soup
suspicious.description: A simple and unadorned soup dish. The wilted seagrass, the crushed little bits of tofu, and the overly thick flavor are a real hazard to one's mood if consumed first thing in the morning.
suspicious.effect: Restores 8% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 210 HP every 5s for 30s.

normal.name: Miso Soup
normal.description: A simple and unadorned soup dish. The ingredients used here are very common and it is made simply, but this small bowl of soup has the power to ensure that you shall not grow weary on your journey, even if you travel on foot.
normal.effect: Restores 9% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 260 HP every 5s for 30s.

delicious.name: Delicious Miso Soup
delicious.description: A simple and unadorned soup dish. The flavorful soup gives off a leaven fragrance. One mouthful of this with rice will ensure the completeness of the entire meal.
delicious.effect: Restores 10% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 300 HP every 5s for 30s.

special.name: "Warmth"
special.description: Thoma's specialty. The intricate appearance of this dish belies the simple ingredients used. But take a sip, and Thoma's sunshine smile comes straight to mind. Perhaps this is his special ability: warming the hearts of others using the simplest of ingredients.
special.effect: Restores 14% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 350 HP every 5s for 30s.

food.name: Mixed Yakisoba
food.description: One of Inazuma's common household dishes. One merely needs to stir-fry the noodles and side dishes evenly before serving, making this an easy-to-make and filling dish. It is no wonder, then, that this dish is so sought after among Inazumans.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Mixed Yakisoba
suspicious.description: One of Inazuma's common household dishes. Both the noodles and the side dishes show signs of having been burned black, testament to the tragedy that must have befallen earlier.
suspicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 250 HP.

normal.name: Mixed Yakisoba
normal.description: One of Inazuma's common household dishes. One merely needs to stir-fry the noodles and side dishes evenly before serving, making this an easy-to-make and filling dish. It is no wonder, then, that this dish is so sought after among Inazumans.
normal.effect: Revives a character and restores 400 HP.

delicious.name: Delicious Mixed Yakisoba
delicious.description: One of Inazuma's common household dishes. Some mysterious art of seasoning has been imparted upon the slightly curled noodles and ordinary side dishes. Smooth, springy, rich... the magic at work on the plate is such that one will never tire of cleaning it out.
delicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 550 HP.

food.name: Mondstadt Grilled Fish
food.description: Fish grilled thoroughly with moderate fire, making it completely dry and crispy. The sprinkled pepper on top brings out the freshness of the fish.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Mondstadt Grilled Fish
suspicious.description: Fish grilled thoroughly with moderate fire. Sadly, it's a bit too well done. The charred smell and the dry texture are not too impressive.
suspicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 50 HP.

normal.name: Mondstadt Grilled Fish
normal.description: Fish grilled thoroughly with moderate fire, making it completely dry and crispy. The sprinkled pepper on top brings out the freshness of the fish.
normal.effect: Revives a character and restores 100 HP.

delicious.name: Delicious Mondstadt Grilled Fish
delicious.description: Fish grilled thoroughly with moderate fire, locking the delicious juice inside the meat under the crispy skin. A small bite is all that's needed to unlock its wondrous and delicious taste.
delicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 150 HP.

special.name: Definitely Not Bar Food!
special.description: Diona's specialty. The fish skin is crisp, and the meat is sumptuous. Only someone with a sufficiently great love for fish would be able to bring out such lovely flavors. Now, if only there were something to drink to go with it... Uh-oh, she's looking this way!
special.effect: Revives a character and restores 10% of Max HP, then restores an additional 150 HP.

food.name: Mondstadt Hash Brown
food.description: A fried cake of mashed potatoes. A little bit of pinecone helps give it a nice crunch, and great with a bit of jam. Loved by people of all ages.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Mondstadt Hash Brown
suspicious.description: A fried cake of mashed potatoes. It's said that a hash brown without jam is not worthy of the Mondstadt name... But is this even a hash brown?
suspicious.effect: Restores 30% of Max HP and an additional 600 HP to the selected character.

normal.name: Mondstadt Hash Brown
normal.description: A fried cake of mashed potatoes. A little bit of pinecone helps give it a nice crunch, and great with a bit of jam. Loved by people of all ages.
normal.effect: Restores 32% of Max HP and an additional 1,250 HP to the selected character.

delicious.name: Delicious Mondstadt Hash Brown
delicious.description: A fried cake of mashed potatoes. Close your eyes and feel the mild breeze and sweet dew that Mondstadt offers.
delicious.effect: Restores 34% of Max HP and an additional 1,900 HP to the selected character.

special.name: Puppy-Paw Hash Brown
special.description: Razor's specialty. Carefully shaped to resemble a wolf's paw. You can really feel the effort he has put into trying human cooking.
special.effect: Restores 40% of Max HP and an additional 2,350 HP to the selected character.

food.name: Moon Pie
food.description: A traditional staple from Mondstadt. Not only is the pickled meat within deeply flavorful, but the meringue has also maintained its sweetness and moisture through the baking process. This dish is not to be missed at any festival in Mondstadt.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Moon Pie
suspicious.description: A traditional staple from Mondstadt. The burnt-yellow meringue looks barely passable. Don't let any Mondstadt locals see you dead with this thing, or they might just take it upon themselves to ensure that you never fail again.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 25% and DEF by 165 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Moon Pie
normal.description: A traditional staple from Mondstadt. Not only is the pickled meat within deeply flavorful, but the meringue has also maintained its sweetness and moisture through the baking process. This dish is not to be missed at any festival in Mondstadt.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 30% and DEF by 200 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Moon Pie
delicious.description: A traditional staple from Mondstadt. As you cut a slice off this small meat pie, the aromas of butter and meat assault your senses simultaneously. The rustic, sweet mouthfeel reminds you of the sights and sounds of harvest festivals, bringing a smile unbidden to your face.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 35% and DEF by 235 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

special.name: Stormcrest Pie
special.description: Eula's specialty. It's hard to say if the unorthodox, non-full-moon shape is meant to flout tradition or express her "tooth for a tooth" ethos. A rich, savory, and smoky flavor emanates from beneath the golden outer crust, unlikely to be reproducible by anybody else in Mondstadt. Best not to tell her all this, though, lest she add it to her list of personal vendettas.
special.effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 40% and DEF by 282 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

food.name: Mora Meat
food.description: A large hunk of minced meat packaged inside a pastry. When you split the pastry in two, minced meat spills out. The taste of meat grease is all but gone, and the baking process has brought out the sweetness of the pastry. Such pastries are usually stamped with the word "Mora," all the better to represent wealth and fortune.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Mora Meat
suspicious.description: A large hunk of minced meat packaged inside a pastry. The tough pastry shell almost seems to sally out against your teeth as you bite into it. If you fight through the greasiness and only chew on the minced meat, you can sort of taste its flavor.
suspicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 50 HP.

normal.name: Mora Meat
normal.description: A large hunk of minced meat packaged inside a pastry. When you split the pastry in two, minced meat spills out. The taste of meat grease is all but gone, and the baking process has brought out the sweetness of the pastry. Such pastries are usually stamped with the word "Mora," all the better to represent wealth and fortune.
normal.effect: Revives a character and restores 100 HP.

delicious.name: Delicious Mora Meat
delicious.description: A large hunk of minced meat packaged inside a pastry. With a crispy crust and tender meat, this legendary delicacy is so succulent that not even Mora laid in front of you could distract you from enjoying it.
delicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 150 HP.

special.name: Qiankun Mora Meat
special.description: Ningguang's specialty. The pastry is perfectly soft and waxy, as is the consistency of the meat, and the honey-like meat juices ooze out as you squeeze it. Wherever did the high and mighty Tianquan Lady Ningguang learn to make this dish?
special.effect: Revives a character and restores 10% of Max HP, then restores an additional 150 HP.

food.name: More-and-More
food.description: A snack grilled on an iron plate. Water is added to flour and stirred into a slurry, vegetables and meat are added, and the mix is grilled well on an iron plate before taking on a splash of sauce and a sprinkle of dried bonito flakes. This tastes delicious no matter how many ingredients one adds, and indeed it makes people feel like "the more ingredients, the merrier," hence the dish's name.

suspicious.name: Suspicious More-and-More
suspicious.description: A snack grilled on an iron plate. It certainly looks the part, but you start getting a bad feeling about this upon first bite. Guess you can't slack off when making food after all, huh?
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 20% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: More-and-More
normal.description: A snack grilled on an iron plate. Water is added to flour and stirred into a slurry, vegetables and meat are added, and the mix is grilled well on an iron plate before taking on a splash of sauce and a sprinkle of dried bonito flakes. This tastes delicious no matter how many ingredients one adds, and indeed it makes people feel like "the more ingredients, the merrier," hence the dish's name.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 30% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious More-and-More
delicious.description: A snack grilled on an iron plate. The rich ingredients have been stacked atop one another. One bite into the crisp outer layer reveals the soft tenderness within. The lovely sauce clothes the condiments luxuriously, flowing between lips and teeth alike en route to the stomach. Even the aroma that lingers in the air has ascended to become part of its unforgettable deliciousness.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 40% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

food.name: Mushroom Pizza
food.description: A pizza covered in cheese and mushrooms. When still warm, the cheese becomes stretchy and gooey, making it extremely satisfying to eat.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Mushroom Pizza
suspicious.description: A pizza covered in cheese and mushrooms. If you can bite through the brick-like texture... At least it can ease your hunger.
suspicious.effect: Restores 26% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 450 HP every 5s for 30s.

normal.name: Mushroom Pizza
normal.description: A pizza covered in cheese and mushrooms. When still warm, the cheese becomes stretchy and gooey, making it extremely satisfying to eat.
normal.effect: Restores 28% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 620 HP every 5s for 30s.

delicious.name: Delicious Mushroom Pizza
